title: Phase 3: Entity & Edge Embedding Generation
description: Complete implementation of embedding generation for graph entities and relationships. Includes EntityEmbedder, EdgeEmbedder, repository indexing, comprehensive testing, and optional Triplex integration.

title: Phase 3 Documentation
description: Create docs/PHASE-3-COMPLETION-SUMMARY.md (~400 lines). Update CLAUDE.md (architecture) and README.md (embedding examples). Include complete implementation summary, usage examples, performance benchmarks, troubleshooting guide. Agent: technical-writer specialist.

title: EntityEmbedder Implementation
description: Create src/lib/entity-embedder.ts (~200 lines). Implement EntityEmbedder class with: batch processing for entities, entity formatting as 'name :: kind :: hints', transaction-safe embedding storage, error handling and logging. Agent: coder specialist.

title: EntityEmbedder Unit Tests
description: Create tests/lib/entity-embedder.test.ts (~100 lines). Test entity formatting (complete/minimal properties), batch processing (50 entities), transaction rollback, empty repository handling. Agent: tester specialist.

title: EdgeEmbedder Implementation
description: Create src/lib/edge-embedder.ts (~200 lines). Implement EdgeEmbedder class with: SQL JOIN for context extraction, edge formatting as 'S <predicate> O :: context', batch processing (100 edges), cross-repository edge handling. Agent: coder specialist.

title: EdgeEmbedder Unit Tests
description: Create tests/lib/edge-embedder.test.ts (~100 lines). Test edge formatting with context, SQL JOIN correctness, cross-repository edges, batch processing validation. Agent: tester specialist.

title: Repository Indexing Implementation
description: Modify src/lib/repository-indexer.ts (+200 lines). Implement: file scanning (TS/JS/MD), content chunking strategy, entity extraction integration, EntityEmbedder and EdgeEmbedder integration, progress tracking. Agent: backend-architect for design, then coder for implementation.

title: Repository Indexing Tests
description: Create tests/lib/repository-indexer.test.ts (~150 lines). Test file scanning, chunking validation, progress tracking, error recovery. Agent: tester specialist.

title: End-to-End Integration Test
description: Create tests/integration/embedding-generation-e2e.test.ts (~200 lines). Test full repository indexing flow, sample TypeScript project fixture, hybrid search validation with generated embeddings, performance benchmarks (<5 min for 100 files). Agent: quality-engineer specialist.

title: Triplex Integration (OPTIONAL)
description: Create src/lib/triple-extractor.ts (~150 lines). Modify src/providers/config.ts (+30 lines) and factory.ts (+50 lines). Implement Triplex provider configuration, triple extraction, fallback to DocumentProcessor, environment variable configuration. Agent: ml-developer specialist.
notes: Deferred as optional. Can be implemented in future phase if needed. Current DocumentProcessor provides adequate entity extraction.
